verses.verse: But the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4603>committed<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> in the accursed <S%H2764>thing:<s%> for <S%H5912>Achan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2067>Zabdi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the accursed <S%H2764>thing:<s%> and the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from <S%H4480>Jericho<s%> <S%H3405><s%> to <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5973>beside<s%> <S%H1007>Beth-aven,<s%> on the east <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6924><s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H7270>view<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>country.<s%> And the <S%H376>men<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H7270>viewed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And they <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Let <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> go <S%H5927>up;<s%> but let about <S%H505>two<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5857>Ai;<s%> and make <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H3021>labor<s%> <S%H8033>thither;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are but <S%H4592>few.<s%>

So there went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> about <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> and they <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them about <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H376>men:<s%> for they <S%H7291>chased<s%> them from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H7671>Shebarim,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them in the going <S%H4174>down:<s%> wherefore the <S%H3824>hearts<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4549>melted,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7167>rent<s%> his <S%H8071>clothes,<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>eventide,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5927>put<s%> <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>Alas,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> hast thou at all <S%H5674>brought<s%> <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> to <S%H6>destroy<s%> us? would to <S%H3863>God<s%> we had been <S%H2974>content,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan!<s%>

O <S%H994><s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H310>when<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2015>turneth<s%> their <S%H6203>backs<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies!<s%>

For the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> of it, and shall environ us <S%H5437>round,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> wilt thou <S%H6213>do<s%> unto thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name?<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> Get thee <S%H6965>up;<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> <S%H5307>liest<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H2088>thus<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H6440>face?<s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> hath <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> and they have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them: for they have <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the accursed <S%H2764>thing,<s%> and have <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1589>stolen,<s%> and <S%H3584>dissembled<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and they have <S%H7760>put<s%> it <S%H1571>even<s%> among their own <S%H3627>stuff.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6965>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> but <S%H6437>turned<s%> their <S%H6203>backs<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H2764>accursed:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> you any <S%H3254>more,<s%> <S%H518>except<s%> <S%H3808><s%> ye <S%H8045>destroy<s%> the <S%H2764>accursed<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> you.

Up, <S%H6965><s%> <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> Sanctify <S%H6942>yourselves<s%> against <S%H4279>tomorrow:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> There is an accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee, O <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> thou <S%H3201>canst<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6965>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thine <S%H341>enemies,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> ye take <S%H5493>away<s%> the accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H7130><s%> you.

In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> therefore ye shall be <S%H7126>brought<s%> according to your <S%H7626>tribes:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3920>taketh<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> according to the <S%H4940>families<s%> thereof; and the <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3920>take<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> by <S%H1004>households;<s%> and the <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3920>take<s%> shall <S%H7126>come<s%> man by <S%H1397>man.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that he that is <S%H3920>taken<s%> with the accursed <S%H2764>thing<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath: <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by their <S%H7626>tribes;<s%> and the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> was taken: <S%H3920><s%>

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and he <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zarhites:<s%> and he <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zarhites<s%> man by <S%H1397>man;<s%> and <S%H2067>Zabdi<s%> was taken: <S%H3920><s%>

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1004>household<s%> man by <S%H1397>man;<s%> and <S%H5912>Achan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3756>Carmi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2067>Zabdi,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> was <S%H3920>taken.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H5912>Achan,<s%> My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7760>give,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H8426>confession<s%> unto him; and <S%H5046>tell<s%> me <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>done;<s%> <S%H3582>hide<s%> it <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me.

And <S%H5912>Achan<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H546>Indeed<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H2063>thus<s%> and <S%H2063>thus<s%> have I done: <S%H6213><s%>

When I <S%H7200>saw<s%> among the <S%H7998>spoils<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H8152>Babylonish<s%> <S%H155>garment,<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H3956>wedge<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> <S%H4948>weight,<s%> then I <S%H2530>coveted<s%> them, and <S%H3947>took<s%> them; and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H2934>hid<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of my <S%H168>tent,<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> it.

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> and they <S%H7323>ran<s%> unto the <S%H168>tent;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H2934>hid<s%> in his <S%H168>tent,<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> it.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> them out of the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and laid them <S%H3332>out<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him, <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5912>Achan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah,<s%> and the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H155>garment,<s%> and the <S%H3956>wedge<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and his <S%H7794>oxen,<s%> and his <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and his <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and his <S%H168>tent,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had: and they <S%H5927>brought<s%> them unto the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> hast thou <S%H5916>troubled<s%> us? the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5916>trouble<s%> thee <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5619>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones,<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> them with <S%H784>fire,<s%> after they had <S%H7275>stoned<s%> them with <S%H68>stones.<s%>

And they <S%H6965>raised<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7725>turned<s%> from the <S%H4480>fierceness<s%> <S%H2740><s%> of his <S%H639>anger.<s%> <S%H5921>Wherefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called,<s%> The <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5911>Achor,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
